SEARCH
Package com.github.timmy80.mia.core

Class ApplicationContext

java.lang.Object
com.github.timmy80.mia.core.ApplicationContext
public class ApplicationContext extends Object
A common context for multiple Task
Ex : A call on stop() will perform a stop on all the Task of this context.
Author:
anthony

      The netty EventLoopGroup for this context.

  • Constructor Details

    • ApplicationContext

      protected ApplicationContext(ApplicationContextParams params)
      Create an ApplicationContext with customized parameter.
      Parameters:
      params - This context parameters. Will be cloned, so you wont be able to change them afterwards.

    • ApplicationContext

      protected ApplicationContext()
      Create an ApplicationContext with the default parameters.

  • Method Details

    • getDefault

      public static ApplicationContext getDefault()
      Get or Allocate the default ApplicationContext using the default parameters.
      Returns:
      the default ApplicationContext

    • addTask

      protected void addTask(Task task)
      Register a task to this ApplicationContext.
      This method is called on task creation.
      Parameters:
      task - an implementation of Task

    • removeTask

      protected void removeTask(Task task)
      Remove a Task from this ApplicationContext.
      This method is called when a task ends.
      Parameters:
      task - an implementation of Task

    • getEventloopgroup

      public io.netty.channel.EventLoopGroup getEventloopgroup()
      Get the eventLoopGroup for Netty
      Returns:
      the EventLoopGroup of this ApplicationContext

    • getProbeInetHost

      public String getProbeInetHost()
      Get the host IP listened to for probes.
      Returns:
      An IP represented as a String

    • getProbeInetPort

      public int getProbeInetPort()
      Get the port listened to for probes
      Returns:
      A TCP port number

    • getProbes

      protected HashMap<String,Class<ProbeHandlerTerm>> getProbes()
      Get the probe handlers.
      Returns:
      A Map where key=path, path=handler class.

    • isStopPending

      public boolean isStopPending()
      Get the stop sequence status
      Returns:
      True if stop sequence is pending.

    • taskSet

      public Set<Task> taskSet()
      Provide a read only set on Task registered to this ApplicationContext
      Returns:
      A read only set of Task. Never null.

    • watchdogCheck

      public boolean watchdogCheck(long timeMilliseconds)
      Check if all the tasks registered to this ApplicationContext have performed a full scan since at least timeMilliseconds.
      Parameters:
      timeMilliseconds - The time in milliseconds that a Task must not exceed for a fullScan.
      Returns:
      True if all the tasks are OK. False otherwise.

    • stop

      public void stop()
      Call Task.stopTask() on all the tasks registered to this ApplicationContext

    • join

      public void join()
      Join all the Tasks registered to this context.
      This method is intended to be called after stop()
